channel.title: Burj Khalifa on Tech Jaunts
channel.description: Recent content in Burj Khalifa on Tech Jaunts

item.title: Dubai diaries: Balancing Work and Travel
item.description: Dubai is an exciting destination for travelers, with its modern architecture, luxury shopping, and vibrant nightlife. But what if you’re also working remotely while exploring Dubai? My wife and I recently had the opportunity to do just that, and we learned a lot about how to balance work and travel in this unique destination. One of the biggest challenges we faced was the time difference. Dubai is 1:30 hours behind India, which meant that we had to start our workday earlier than usual.
